mapper.sql:
ver_softver.SOFT_ID, ver_softver.TYPE_ID, ver_softtype.NAME "TypeName", ver_softver.NAME, ver_softver.PACK_NAME, ver_softver.VER_NO, ver_softver.PACK_URL,
ver_softver.ISU_TIME, ver_softver.IS_FORCE, ver_softver.UPDATE_LOG, ver_softver.ABOUT, mdi_fileinfo.URL_PATH, ver_softtype.TYPE_ID, mdi_fileinfo.FILE_ID
SOFT_ID, USER_ID, CHNL_ID, TYPE_ID, NAME, PACK_NAME, VER_NO, PACK_URL, IMG_ID, ISU_TIME, IS_FORCE, RES2, RES3, RES4, LAST_TIME,UPDATE_LOG, ABOUT
mapper.select:
select count(*) from ver_softver, ver_softtype, mdi_fileinfo where ver_softver.TYPE_ID=ver_softtype.TYPE_ID and ver_softver.IMG_ID= mdi_fileinfo.FILE_ID and ver_softver.CHNL_ID=#{chnlId}
and ver_softver.TYPE_ID=#{typeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT SOFT.NAME, SOFT.PACK_NAME, SOFT.VER_NO, SOFT.PACK_URL, SOFT.ISU_TIME, SOFT.IS_FORCE, SOFT.UPDATE_LOG, SOFT.ABOUT, FILE.URL_PATH FROM `mdi_fileinfo` AS FILE,`ver_softver` AS SOFT WHERE SOFT.IMG_ID=FILE_ID AND SOFT.SOFT_ID=#{sofId}

SELECT VER_SOFTVER.`SOFT_ID`, VER_SOFTTYPE.`TYPE_ID`, VER_SOFTTYPE.`NAME` "TypeName", VER_SOFTVER.`NAME`, VER_SOFTVER.`PACK_NAME`, VER_SOFTVER.`VER_NO`, VER_SOFTVER.`PACK_URL`, VER_SOFTVER.`ISU_TIME`, MDI_FILEINFO.`URL_PATH`, VER_SOFTVER.`IS_FORCE`, VER_SOFTVER.`UPDATE_LOG`, VER_SOFTVER.`ABOUT`
FROM VER_SOFTVER, MDI_FILEINFO, VER_SOFTTYPE
WHERE VER_SOFTTYPE.`TYPE_ID`=VER_SOFTVER.`TYPE_ID` AND VER_SOFTVER.`IMG_ID`=MDI_FILEINFO.`FILE_ID` AND VER_SOFTVER.`NAME` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into ver_softver (SOFT_ID, USER_ID, CHNL_ID, TYPE_ID, NAME, PACK_NAME, VER_NO, PACK_URL, IMG_ID, ISU_TIME, IS_FORCE, RES2, RES3, RES4, LAST_TIME, UPDATE_LOG, ABOUT) values (#{softId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chnlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{packName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{packUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isuTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isForce,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{res2,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{res3,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{res4,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{lastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateLog,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{about,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert into ver_softver
SOFT_ID,
USER_ID,
CHNL_ID,
TYPE_ID,
NAME,
PACK_NAME,
VER_NO,
PACK_URL,
IMG_ID,
ISU_TIME,
IS_FORCE,
RES2,
RES3,
RES4,
LAST_TIME,
UPDATE_LOG,
ABOUT,
#{softId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{chnlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{packName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{verNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{packUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{imgId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{isuTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{isForce,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{res2,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{res3,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{res4,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{lastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateLog,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
#{about,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update ver_softver
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHNL_ID = #{chnlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE_ID = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PACK_NAME = #{packName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VER_NO = #{verNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PACK_URL = #{packUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IMG_ID = #{imgId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ISU_TIME = #{isuTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_FORCE = #{isForce,jdbcType=CHAR},
RES2 = #{res2,jdbcType=CHAR},
RES3 = #{res3,jdbcType=CHAR},
RES4 = #{res4,jdbcType=CHAR},
LAST_TIME = #{lastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_LOG = #{updateLog,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
ABOUT = #{about,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where SOFT_ID = #{softId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ver_softver set USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHNL_ID = #{chnlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE_ID = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PACK_NAME = #{packName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VER_NO = #{verNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PACK_URL = #{packUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMG_ID = #{imgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ISU_TIME = #{isuTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_FORCE = #{isForce,jdbcType=CHAR}, RES2 = #{res2,jdbcType=CHAR}, RES3 = #{res3,jdbcType=CHAR}, RES4 = #{res4,jdbcType=CHAR}, LAST_TIME = #{lastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_LOG = #{updateLog,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, ABOUT = #{about,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SOFT_ID = #{softId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ver_softver set USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHNL_ID = #{chnlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE_ID = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PACK_NAME = #{packName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VER_NO = #{verNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PACK_URL = #{packUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMG_ID = #{imgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ISU_TIME = #{isuTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_FORCE = #{isForce,jdbcType=CHAR}, RES2 = #{res2,jdbcType=CHAR}, RES3 = #{res3,jdbcType=CHAR}, RES4 = #{res4,jdbcType=CHAR}, LAST_TIME = #{lastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where SOFT_ID = #{softId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
